comments:
Build ID: =M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
1. installed CDT and other language IDE like PHP 
2. create/import a php files into a new php project and try
opening the files
3. error dialog popups repeatedly on each click. the file successfully opens after some definite number of clicks. this happens only when opening for the first time


More information:
the log is below:
